QueryDefinition.Query: select distinct ptid, cast(replace(ptid, 'PT','') as bigint) as PersonId, lower(gender) gender, case when lower(birth_yr) like '% and earlier' then '1927' else birth_yr end as YearOfBirth, race, case when lower(race) = 'caucasian' then 8527 when lower(race) = 'african american' then 8516 when lower(race) = 'asian' then 8515 else 0 end as RaceConceptId, ethnicity, case when lower(ethnicity) = 'hispanic' then 38003563 else 0 end as EthnicityConceptId, region + '_' + division as location_source_value, provid_pcp, substring(first_month_active, 1, 4) + '-' + substring(first_month_active, 5, 2) + '-01' as first_month_active, substring(last_month_active, 1, 4) + '-' + substring(last_month_active, 5, 2) + '-01' as last_month_active, 38000280 as PeriodTypeConceptId, substring(date_of_death, 1, 4) + '-' + substring(date_of_death, 5, 2) + '-01' as date_of_death, case when date_of_death is not null then 1 else 0 end as died, '' as cause_source_value FROM {sc}.patient JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND patient.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE where birth_yr != 'Unknown' order by cast(replace(ptid, 'PT','') as bigint)
